scripts.test:e2e: TS_NODE_PROJECT=e2e/tsconfig.json cucumber-js e2e/features --require-module ts-node/register --require 'e2e/support/**/*.ts' --require 'e2e/steps/**/*.ts' --format progress-bar --config e2e/config/cucumber.config.js
scripts.test:e2e:android: TS_NODE_PROJECT=e2e/tsconfig.json cucumber-js e2e/features --require-module ts-node/register --require 'e2e/support/**/*.ts' --require 'e2e/steps/**/*.ts' --format progress-bar --tags '@android' --config e2e/config/cucumber.config.js
scripts.test:e2e:ios: TS_NODE_PROJECT=e2e/tsconfig.json cucumber-js e2e/features --require-module ts-node/register --require 'e2e/support/**/*.ts' --require 'e2e/steps/**/*.ts' --format progress-bar --tags '@ios' --config e2e/config/cucumber.config.js
scripts.build:android: cd fastlane && bundle exec fastlane build_android
scripts.build:android:debug: cd fastlane && bundle exec fastlane build_android build_type:debug
scripts.build:android:release: cd fastlane && bundle exec fastlane build_android build_type:release
scripts.build:ios: cd fastlane && bundle exec fastlane build_ios
scripts.build:ios:debug: cd fastlane && bundle exec fastlane build_ios build_type:debug
scripts.build:ios:release: cd fastlane && bundle exec fastlane build_ios build_type:release
scripts.bump:patch: cd fastlane && bundle exec fastlane bump_patch
scripts.bump:minor: cd fastlane && bundle exec fastlane bump_minor
scripts.bump:major: cd fastlane && bundle exec fastlane bump_major
